articles.title: Is Tyler Allgeier lead running back material for the Atlanta Falcons? - Deseret News
articles.description: Former BYU standout Tyler Allgeier is the latest addition to the Atlanta Falcons running back group, after the franchise used a fifth-round draft pick on him in the 2022 NFL draft. How does he fit into the team’s plans this year?
articles.content:
Tyler Allgeier was a hidden-gem sort of a find for the BYU football program he joined the team as a walk-on in 2018 and left as one of its most productive running backs in school history.
